content: Yes, PHP can be used for back-end development. It is a server-side scripting language commonly used for web development, and it has built-in support for connecting to databases, handling user input, and generating dynamic web pages. PHP is also well-supported by a large community of developers, which makes it easier to find help and resources when needed. Additionally, PHP can be used in combination with various front-end technologies, such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to create dynamic and interactive web applications.
